mapper.insert: insert into member_tm_student (open_member_id, member_id, en_name, real_name, mobile, credit, eng_grade_score, avatar, status, lock_status, active_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, invitor_open_member_id, password) values (#{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{engGradeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invitorOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update member_tm_student set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eng_grade_score = #{engGradeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invitor_open_member_id = #{invitorOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where open_member_id = #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select open_member_id, member_id, en_name, real_name, mobile, credit, eng_grade_score, avatar, status, lock_status, active_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, invitor_open_member_id, password from member_tm_student where open_member_id = #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
